“etetere m n’ụra otu ụbọchị ma gwa nne m na m chọrọ ịlọta Naịjirịa bịa sonye n’asọmpi nwada kachasị mma na Naịjirịa. 
Nwada a dị afọ iri abụọ na otu bụ onye Edo Steeti nke Naịjirịa. 
Ọ sị na a mụrụ ya na Naịjirịa mana mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu ka nne na nna ya kwagara na mba Amerịka kpọrọ zie ya. 
Montana sị na ọ bụ maka asọmpi ‘Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria’ (MBGN) mere o jiri lọta Naịjirịa. 
Ugbua ọ ga-anọchiteanya Naịjirịa n’asọmpi ‘Miss Universe’ nke ụwa n’ụbọchị iri na isii (16th) Jenụwarị, 2023. 
Kirie ihe o kwuru. 
Ndị mere akụkọ a Makuochi Okafor, Chioma Nkemdilim Daramola, Okechukwu Omeire.

Arunma Oteh, Chimamanda Adichie, Oby Ezekwesili Ala Igbo nwere ọtụtụ ụmụnwaanyị meterela ihe e ji echeta ha ma na Naịjirịa ma n'ụwa gbaa gburugburu Nwaanyị dị, nwaanyị adịkwa mana ọtụtụ ndị ga-ekwenyere gị ma ị kwuo na uru dị n'ịlụ nwaanyị Igbo. 
N'agbanyeghị na ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu na ịlụ nwaanyị Igbo kachasị ada ọnụ, ọtụtụ ndị ga-agwa gị na uru dị n'ịlụ nwaafọ Igbo. 
Ọtụtụ ụmụnwaanyị Igbo na-abụ ngọzị, ha anaghị abụ ọgbatuhie nye di ha na ezinaụlọ ha. 
Obodo kachasị adaọnụ n'ịlụ nnwayị n'ala Igbo Mazi Nwonwu Ụmụnwaanyị Igbo na-akwadosi di ha ike na-atụghị ụjọ ihe ọbụla.

Instagram/Getty Images/ Angela campaign E nwere obodo a ga-akọgide akụkọ ha ghara ịkọta maka maọbụ kpọta ụmụnwaanyị ha aha? I cheta ngagharịiwe ụmụnwaanyị Aba nke a ma dịka 'Aba Women's Riot', ị mara na ọ bụghị taa ka ụmụnwaanyị Abịa kpawara ike. 
Dịka e si ekwu na "n'azụ nwoke ọbụla na-eme ọfụma, ị ga-ahụ nwaanyị na-akwado ya", etu ahụ ka ọ dị n'obodo dị iche iche. 
Na obodo dị mma bụkwanụ na e nwere ụmụnwaanyị na-eme ihe ọma e ji eme ọnụ. 
BBC Igbo chọrọ igosi gị ụmụnwaanyị Abịa steeti na-eme/mee ihe ndị mmadụ ga-eji cheta ha.

Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala Reuters Okonjo-Iweala bụ minista na-ahụ maka akụnaụba Naịjirịa oge Goodluck Jonathan chịrị Naịjirịa N'agbanyeghi na a mụrụ ya na Delta steeti, mana a ga-agụnye ya n'okpuru ụmụnwaanyị Abịa steeti makana ọ bụ ebe ahụ ka a na-alụ ya. 
A ga-akọ ole ghara ole maka Okonjo-Iweala? A bịa n'ihe gbasara nchekwa akụnaụba obodo, ọ nọ ya.

 Ọ bụ onye ihe gbasara ego na nchịkọta akụnaụba doro anya ọfụma.

NFF/twitter Nke a bụ ugboro abụọ ndị France na-emeri ndị Falcons Ụmụnwaanyị egwu bọlụ nke Naịjirịa bụ Super Falcons na nke ndị France sọrọmpi enyi na enyi ụnyahụ bụ Fraide. 
Ya bụ mpi ha sọrọ kpọrọ ndị super Falcons ihụ ọjọọ site na ịgba ha ọkpụ asatọ chara acha na ọgbọ egwuruegwu MMArena na Le Mans, nke France. 
Mpi ha sọrọ bụ nke enyi na enyi maka nkwado egwuruegwu ụmụnwaanyị mba Afrika nke 2018. 
Ihe a bụ ụkwụ egwụ mbụ onye nkuzi ha bụ Thomas Dennerby nke Sweden tụrụ. 
 Nke a bụ ugboro abụọ ndị France na-emeri ndị Falcons. 
Nke mbụ bụ na iko mba ụwa nke ụmụnwaanyị nke agbara na Germany na 2011 bụ nke ha ji otu (1 - 0)ọkpụ were merie ha. 
France bidoro ozigbo amalitere ya bụ egwuruegwu chawa ọkụ nke bụ na ha chọrọ itiney otu golu na nkeji iri na anọ (nkeji 14) mana Chiamaka Nnadozie ekweghị ekwe. 
Okụ ndị France na-acha mịtara mkpụrụ na nkeji nke iri itoolu (nkeji 9) mgbe nwaada Eugenie Le Sommer tinyere ofu n'ọnụgolu. 
Mgbe ọ banyere nkeji iri abụọ na isii (nkeji 26) ritere akwụkwọ edo maka arụrụala ọrụsara onye France. 
Tupu ezụmike erụọ, France agbakanyela golụ atọ n'ọnụ gola ndị Super Falcons. 
 Ka anatachara ezumike (nkeji 54 ), Desire Oparanozie yiri ha egwu site na pịawanyere bọlụ dị ọkụ na golu ndị France mana golii ha egweghị ekwe. 
 Egwu Oparanozie menyere ha pụrụ ha n'anya mgbe onye otu ha bụ Aminata Dilalo tinyere golu ọzọ na ọnụgọlu ndị Super Falcon. 
Golu ọzọ nke Gauvin nyere sochiri azụ na nkeji 70 iji mezue ya ọkpụ ise ndị Falcon ji na-ụkwọ. 
 Ha  kabakwara ahụ imezụ ya ọkpụ asaa tinyere nke Faith Ikidi jị aka ya nye onwe ha bụ nke mezuru ya ọkpụ asaa. 
Tupu egwuruegwu ahụ abia n'isi njedebe, Marie-Charlotte Leger gbara mbọ tinye ofu golu ọzọ nke mezuru ya asatọ. 
BBC anaghị ahụta maka ọdịnaya nke saịtị ndị dị na mpụga. 
Usoro anyị maka njikọ dị na mpụga.. 
Getty Images Mba Spain ebuliela iko mbaụwa nke egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị nke afọ 2023. 
Nke a mere dịka ha ji otu ọkpụ goolu asataghị ihe merie ụmụnwaanyị England n'ụbọchị Sọnde. 
Olga Carmona, bụkwa kaptịn ndị Spen, bụ onye nyetere otu goolu ha ji merie na nkeji iri abụọ na itoolu nke asọmpi ahụ. 
Spen nwetakwara penariti na nkeji 69, mana ochee bọlụ mba England bụ Mary Earps chere ya. 
BBC anaghị ahụta maka ọdịnaya nke saịtị ndị dị na mpụga. 
Usoro anyị maka njikọ dị na mpụga.. 
Getty Images Otu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa so na otu akacha mara n'asọmpị bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n'Afrịka  Egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n’ụwa na-akpọkọtabụ ọtụtụ igwe ndị mmadụ na ndị nso nso ọnụ karịa nke ụmụnwoke n’oge gara aga – n’ọge ahụ, mgbe ụfọdụ ọnụọgụgụ igwe ndị mmadụn na-abịa ele egwuregwu bọolụ ụmụnwaanyị na-eji ihe ruru 50,000 karịa ndị na-abịa ele nke ụmụnwoke. 
  N’ebe afọ 1920, egwuregwụ bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị na-amịta mkpụrụ nke ukwu dịka mba Briten nwere otu bọọlụ ruru 150. 
 Mana otu na-ahụ maka egwu bọọlụ bụ FA mechara machie egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị dịka ha kwuru na “egwuregwu a adịchaghị mma nye ụmụnwaanyị”. 
 O ruru afọ 50 ọzọ tupu egwụ bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị eteela n’ụra ọzọ, nke a so n’ihe mere egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị ji anọzị n’azụ egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwoke ugbua. 
Dịka a na-agba iko mba ụwa Fifa nke ụmụnwaanyị 2023 na mba New Zealand, anyị tinye anya n’ụfọdụ ihe ndị dị mkpa banyere asọmpị egwuregwụ bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n’ụwa nakwa etu o siri malite. 
 Getty Images Lily Parr bụ nwaanyị mbụ e tinyere aha ya ma nye nkwanye ugwu 'Hall of Fame' pụrụiche n'ụlọ ngosi 'National Football Museum' n'afọ 2002 Lily Parr so na ụmụnwaanyị mbụ ji egwuregwu bọọlụ mere aka ọrụ. 
Ọ gaara otu Dick Kerr nke ụmụnwaanyị bụ otu aha ya si n’ebe a na-edobe ngwa ọgụ na mpaghara Preston n’oge agha ụwa nke mbụ bụ ebe ọtụtụ ndị so n’otu bọọlụ a bi. 
 Otu a bụ otu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị nke mbụ yi uwe ‘shorts’ ma bụrụ otu bọọlụ mbụ gara mba ndị ọzọ ga sonye n’egwuregwu bọọlụ. 
 Nwaada Lily bụ onye ise nwụrụ na-amasị nke bụ na oge ụfọdụ a na-eji akpa anwụrụ sịga (Woodbine cigarettes) akwụ ya ụgwọ ọnwa. 
 Getty Images Lee ọha ndị mmadụ gbakọrọ ikiri asọmpị bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị nke Theatrical Ladies Football a gbara n'afọ 1912 na Briten Igwe ndị mmadụ na-agbakọta ele egwregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n’oge agha a ọkachasị oge amalitere ịkpọku ụmụnwaanyị ka ha malitere ịrụ n’ụlọọrụ mepụta ihe bụbu ebe ụmụnwoke ndị e zigara aha na-arụbu. 
 N’ụbọchị ekeresimesi nke afọ 1917, mmadụ 10,000 gbakọtara lelee asọmpị bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị a gbara na Preston. 
 Ụbọchị na-esote ụbọchị ekeresimesi bụ ụbọchị ‘Boxing Day’ nke afọ 1920, otu ụmụnwaanyị nke Dick Kerr gbara asọmpị nke igwe mmadụ ruru 53,000 bịara kirie n’ama egwuregwu Everton's Goodison Park ground. 
Puku kwuru puku igwe ndị mmadụ chọrọ ibata kirie asọmpị a tọrọ n’ezi ama egwuregwu a dịka ha enweghi ike batanwuo. 
 Otu Everton nke ụmụnwoke ratara ọnụọgụgụ kacha elu ndị bịara kirie asọmpị ha n’afọ 2014/15. 
Ya bụ ọnụọgụgụ bụ 39,000. 
Getty Images Ụmụnwaanyị na-agba egwuregwu bọọlụ n'afọ 1970 tupu a machie ụmụnwaanyị isonye asọmpị a  N’ụbọchị ise nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1921, otu na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ ‘Football Association’ (FA) machiri ụmụnwaanyị isonye n’asọmpị ndị a na-agba bụ nke FA hazịrị. 
Nke a pụtara na ụmụnwaanyị ndị a ma ama dịka Lily Parr enweghiziike esonye n’ama egwuregwu ndị zuruoke ma nwee ihe ndị e ji kwesịrị ekwesị. 
 FA n’oge ahụ kwuru na “asọmpị bọọlụ abụghị ihe dị mma ụmụnwaanyị isonye, ụmụnwaanyị isonye abụghị ihe e kwesịrị ịkwado”. 
 N’afọ 1971, e mechara bulie mmachi a dịka e mechara hibe otu n’ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị ka afọ olemaole gachara – a kpọrọ otu a ‘Women's Football Association’ (WFA). 
Getty Images Otu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Briten n'afọ 1997 mgbe FA malitere ịgba mbọ ikwalite asọmpị bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Iwu maka iji okike mmadụ dịka nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị megide mmadụ, bụ iwu a kpọrọ ‘Sex Discrimination Act’ n’afọ 1975 mere ka ọ dị mfe ụmụnwaanyị ime ọzụzụ ma bụrụ ndị ogbo opi n’egwuregwu bọọlụ. 
 Ọ bịara bụrụ ihe tara akpụ ikiri asọmpị bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n’igwe TV dịka e mechara kpọpụta mpụtara asọmpị ikpeazụ nke ikp mba ụwa ụmụwaanyị n’afọ 1970 n’igwe TV. 
 N’afọ 1989, ụlọ ntaakụkọ Channel 4 malitere igosi egwuregwu bọọlụ oge niile. 
 N’afọ 1997, otu FA wepụtara atụmatụ ha ikwalite egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị si n’ala ruo na ntolite. 
 N’afọ 2011, asọmpị Women’s Super League malitere. 
Dịka ebe ọnwa Sepụtemba 2014 ruru, ihe ruru ụmụnwaanyị nde abụọ na ụma malitere na-agbazị bọọlụ na mba Briten. 
 Super Falcons/Facebook N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ ahụ, e rere akwụkwọ iji bata kirie asọmpị otu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Briten ruru 55,000 nke a bụ ụbọchị ha zutere mba Germany. 
Ọnụọgụgụ riri elu karịa 40,181 bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị zutere akwụkwọ ile egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwoke Briten gbara na Wembley. 
 N’Afrịka, asọmpị bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị malitekwara rịwa elu dịka a malitere ịgba asọmpị ụmụnwanyị Women's Africa Cup of Nations malitere n’afọ 1991 maba e malitere ịgba ya kwa afọ abụọ n’afọ 1998. 
 Otu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa bụ otu Super Falcons bụ otu a ma ama n’egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n’Afrịka nakwa n’ụwa. 
 Otu a enwetela mmeri n’asọmpị Women’s Africa Cup of Nations ugboro 11. 
Otu a bụkwa naanị otu si ‘Confederation of African Football’ rurula agba so agba ikpeazụ n’asọmpị iko mbaụwa Fifa nke ụmụnwaanyị nakwa asọmpị Olympics. 
 Ha sokwa naanị otu ụmụnwaanyị Afrịka ndị sonyerela n’asọmpị iko mbaụwa Fifa niile a gbarala. 
 Asisat Oshoala/Instagram Nwaada Oshoala dị afọ 29 na-agbara otu bọọlụ Barcelona bọọlụ ugbua dịka e depụtara aha ya na mkpọpụta aha ndị a na-akwanyere ugwu nke 'Forbes 30 under 30' Ụfọdụ na-ahụta nwaada Asisat Oshoala bụ onye otu Super Falcons dịka nwaanyị kacha acha ọkụ n’egwuregwu bọọlụ n’Afrịka. 
 O nwetala ihe nrite nwaanyị kacha n’egwu bọọlụ Afrịka ugboro ise (Africa Women’s Footballer of the Year). 
 O nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite n’aha Naịjirịa nakwa aha otu bọọlụ ndị ọzọ ọ na-agbara na mba ofesi. 
BBC anaghị ahụta maka ọdịnaya nke saịtị ndị dị na mpụga. 
Usoro anyị maka njikọ dị na mpụga.. 
Getty Images Dịka akụkọ maka nwaada Hilda Effiong Bassey wuru ewu n'izuụka gara aga maka etu o si sie nri ihe ruru awa 100 na-akwụsịghị akwụsị, ọtụtụ ụmụ Naịjirịa amaghị na e nwekwara ụfọdụ ụmụ Naịjirịa mekwara ihe tụrụ ụwa n'anya ma tinyekwa aha ha n'akwụkwọ akụkọ. 
Lee ụfọdụ n'ime ha nakwa ihe ha mere iji mee ka ụwa mata aha ha:  echechinonso Nwata nwoke a dị afọ 13 tuuru ugo Guinness World Record nke mbụ ya na Nọvemba 2019 maka onye kacha ịkuli boolụ n’otu nkeji ma burukwa bọọlụ ọzọ n’isi. 
Ka ọ dị ugbua, Chinonso,  onye a na-akpọ "Amazing kid Eche" nwekwara ntuurugo ndị ọzọ na 'Guiness World Record' nke gụnyere: Getty Images Fela Kuti banyere na akwụkwọ Guinness World Records maka na o tipụtara egwu ‘studio album’ kachasị. 
 O mekwara egwu album ruru 46 dịka onye na-eti egwu mgbe o tiri egwu afọ 23. 
Egwu mbụ ya bụ n’afọ 1969 ma nke ịkpeazụ ya bụ na 1992. 
Mfon Udoh/Facebook Mfon Udoh banyere na akwụkwọ Guinness World Records maka ịnye goolu kachasị dịka onye ọgba bọọlụ na Premiere League nke Naijirịa. 
O mere nke a site na ịnye goolu 23 oge ọ na-agbara otu bọọlụ Enyimba n'afọ bọọlụ 2013/2014, nke bụkwa afọ mbụ ya n'Enyimba dịka ọ hapụrụ Akwa United FC. 
Wizkid/Facebook Wizkid so na otiegwu Naijirịa aha ya kacha ewu ewu n'ụwa niile. 
 Egwu ya na Drake - bụ otiegwu mba Amerịka - tiri n’afọ 2016 a kpọrọ "One Dance" mere ka ndị mba ofesi mata ya nke ọma mgbe o ruru ebe nke mbụ na Billboard Hot 100 nke mba USA. 
Egwu a wetara ọtụtụ ndekọ mere Wizkid o wee banye na Guinness World Records. 
 N’afọ 2021 Wizkid nwetara nturuugo a kpọrọ ‘Multi Guinness World Record Breaker’, dịka egwu ya bụ “Come Closer” ya na Drake gụrụ, nakwa “Fever” na “Essence” nke ya na Tems gụrụ, nwetara mmeri nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha nweta mmeri nke egwu kachasị na 'All Africa Music Awards' n'afọ 2021. 
Getty Images Keshi banyere na 'Guiness World Record' dịka ọ bụụrụ onye afọ ya kacha nta n'Afrịka buliri iko bọọlụ mba Afrịka bụ Afcon dịka ọgbaa bọọlụ nakwa onye nkuzi. 
Keshi so ndị 'Super Eagles' nke Naịjirịa buo iko Afcon n'afọ 1994, ma bulikwaa ya ọzọ dịka onye nkuzi ndị 'Super Eagles' n'afọ 2013 oge ọ dị afọ 52 na ụbọchị iri. 
Nwaada a bụ ọgba egwu a ma ama, bụrụkwa onye nkụzi ịgba egwu. 
Ọ banyere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dịka ọ bụrụ onye kacha gbaa egwu ogologo oge akwụsịghị akwụsị bụ nke ọ kpọrọ danceathon n'afọ 2006. 
Ọ gbara egwu a awa 55 na nkeji 40. 
Tuedon Omasola Omasola Morgan bụ ọgba ọsọ ama ama n'ụwa, onye aha ya dị ugboro abụọ n'akwụkwọ 'Guiness World Record'. 
Tobi Amusan Tobi mere ụmụ Naịjirịa obi aṅụrị n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2022 dịka o meriri asọmpi ọsọ (100m hurdles) n'egwuregwu asọmpi mbaụwa bụ nke e mere na Oregon, mba Amerịka. 
Amusan mere nke a site n'ịbụ onye kacha gbaa ọsọ 100m hurdles ngwangwa n'ime tịmkọm tịmkọm 12.12. 
Getty Images Anozie na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa n'asọmpi ibuli ihe dị arọ (powerlifting) nke ndị nwere ọrụsị. 
Ọ banyere na 'Guiness World Record' dịka onye kacha buo ihe dị aro n'asọmpi Paralympics nke afọ 2008 na Beijing mba Chaịna, dịka o buliri igwa na-anyị arọ karịrị 82.5kg Gbenga Ezekiel Gbenga Ezekiel bụ nwata nwoke Naịjirịa dị afọ 16. 
Ọ banyere n'akwụkwọ 'Guiness World Record' dịka o bụụrụ onye kacha jiri naanị otu ụkwụ wụọ ụdọ n'ime otu nkeji (ugboro 265). 
Onye jibu nturuugo a bụ Rasel Islam onye mba Bangladesh bụ onye wụtara ụdọ ugboro 262 n'otu ụkwụ. 
BBC anaghị ahụta maka ọdịnaya nke saịtị ndị dị na mpụga. 
Usoro anyị maka njikọ dị na mpụga.. 
Odumodublavck/Instagram Odumodu Black ji aha Decla Rice tie egwu nke gazuru ụwa niile Dịka aha ọgba bọọlụ mba England bụ Declan Rice na-ewu ebe niile na soshal midia ugbua, aha otiegwu a kpọrọ Odumodublvck sokwa ya na-ewu. 
Otu bọọlụ Arsenal nke England kwuputara taa bụ Satọde, Julaị 15, na Declan Rice esonyela n'otu bọọlụ ha, mana n'onyonyo ha ji mee nkwupụta a na Twitter, ha tinyere egwu nke Odumodu Black wepụtara n'afọ a, aha ya bụkwa Declan Rice. 
N'ime otu awa Arsenal ji wepụta ihe onyonyo ahụ n'akara Twitter ha, ndịmmadụ kiriri ya ihe karịrị ugboro nde 4.8. 
Mana onye bụ Odumodu Black? Kedụ etu egwu ya si bụrụ ozurumba ọzụ nke na otu egwu bọọlụ a ma ama dịka Arsenal ji ya ekwupụta onye ọhụrụ ha zụrụ? Chetakwa na Arsenal zụrị Rice site n'otu bọọlụ West Ham, n'ọnụahịa karịrị £105m nke bụ ọnụ ego kachasị otu ahụ na-azụta onye ọgba bọọlụ kamgbe e hibere ha. 
Odumodu tipụtara egwu ọ kpọrọ 'Declan Rice' n'ọnwa Maachị 2023 iji gosi nkwado ya maka ọgba bọọlụ Declan Rice. 
 Egwu ahụ masịrị Declan Rice nke ukwuu maka na ọtụtụ ndị nkwado ya na-eji ya bụ egwu ajalite ya dịka ọ na-agba bọọlụ. 
Ngwangwa Declan Rice mere ihe onyonyo ebe ọ na-agụ egwu ahụ, ọtụtụ mmadụna mba ụwa niile malitere ịchọ ya bụ egwu, nke mere ka aha Odumodu bụrụzie ihe ọtụtụ mmadụ na mba dị icheiche ma. 
Odumodublvck/Instagram Ezigbo aha ya bụ Toochukwu Ojogwu. 
Ọ bụ onye otiegwu na onye ode egwu. 
A mụrụ ya na Legọs, mana nne na nna ya mechara kwafee n'Abuja bụ ebe ọ nọrọ gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị n'ụlọakwụkwọ Christ The King College, Gwagwalada. 
Ọ lọghachiri Legọs gụọ akwụkwọ Mahadum na Mahadum nke Legọs. 
O sonyeere otu 'Native Records' n'afọ 2022. 
'Declan Rice', egwu o tipụtara n'ọnwa Maachị 2023, bụ egwu ya kacha wuo ewuo. 
Nke a bụ maka na Declan Rice n'onwe ya hụrụ egwu ahụ n'anya ma nyekwa aka kesaara ya mmadụ nde abụọ na ụma na-eso ya n'Instagram, nakwa mmadụ puku 572 na-eso ya na Twitter. 
Declan Rice na Odumodu mechara zute onwe ha na London n'ọnwa June afọ a Egwu ya ndị ọzọ Odumodu gụrụ gụnyere 'Picanto' nke ya na oti egwu ọzọ bụ Zlatan so gụọ. 
BBC anaghị ahụta maka ọdịnaya nke saịtị ndị dị na mpụga. 
Usoro anyị maka njikọ dị na mpụga.. 
Auba/Jordan Ayew/Romelu Lukaku/Instagram Egwuregwu bọọlụ ụkwụ bụ egwuregwu a ga-akpọ ọkaibe n'Afrịka n'ihi etu ndị mmadụ si akwado ya. 
Mpaghara Afrịka enyekwala ụwa ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama na ya bụ egwuregwu nke mere na a kpọọ aha Afrịka n'eguregwu bọọlụ, ọtụtụ aha ndị ọkaibe ga-agbata ndị mmadụ n'obi. 
Dịka ọtụtụ afọ na-agafe, mmụta egwuregwu bọọlụ esila n'aka ndị ọkaibe na-agafe n'aka ụmụ ha dịka ọtụtụ ụmụ ndị gbara bọọlụ n'oge gara aga, bụzịkwa ọkaibe nke onwe ha ugbua. 
Lee ụfọdụ ụmụ Afrịka aha ha na-ewu ewu ugbua dịka aha nna ha si wuo ewu n'oge gboo: Jordan Ayew, Andre Ayew, na nna ha bụ Abedi 'Pele' Ayew, n'afọ 2011 oge Andre newtara nturuugo BBC dịka ọkaibe n'Afrịka Andre Ayew na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Jordan bụ Abedi Ayew onye e ji Abedi Pele mara. 
Abedi bụ onye a na-ahụta dịka ọkaibe n'egwuregwu bọọlụ n'Afrịka n'ihi ike ọ kpara oge ọ nọchitere anya mba ya bụ Ghana malite n'afọ 1982 ruo 1998. 
O so na otu ndị Ghana buliri iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 1982, mana ọ gbaghị iko mba ụwa ọbụla tupu ọ laa ezumike. 
Ụmụ ya atọ bụ Andre, Jordan na Rahim bụcha ndị ọgba bọọlụ, mana ọ bụ Andre na Jordan ka a kacha anụ aha ha. 
Na Disemba 2011, Andre Ayew nwetara nturuugo onye kacha agba bọọlụ n'Afrịka nke BBC na-enye; nna ya bụ Abedi ritekwara nturuugo a n'afọ 1991. 
Ugbua, Andre na-agbara otu bọọlụ Al Sadd nke mba Qatar ebe Jordan nọ n'otu bọọlụ Crystal Palace nke mba England. 
Getty Images Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang na nna ya bụ Pierre-François Aubameyang Aubameyang agbaala bọọlụ n'ọtụtụ otu bọọlụ a ma aha ha na mpaghara Europe nke gụnyere: AC Milan, Borussia Dortmund, Arsenal, Barcelona, na Chelsea ebe ọ nọ ugbua. 
Nwa amadị a agbakwaala asọmpi 72 maka mba ya bụ Gabon ma nye goolu 30 tupu ọ laa ezumike ịgbara mba ya bọọlụ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2022. 
Nna ya bụ Pierre-François Aubameyang gbwakwaara mba Gabon bọọlụ malite na 1985 ruo 1998. 
O so mba Gabon gaa asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 1994 (ebe ọ bụ kaptịn) nakwa nke 1996, mana o bughị iko bụla tupu ọ laa ezumike. 
Aubameyang nke okenye gbakwaara otu bọọlụ Stade Lavallois na Le Havre nke mba France. 
 AfricaFootballClassics/Twitter Roger Lukaku, nna Romelu Lukaku Romelu Lukaku bụ aha na-ada ụda n'egwuregwu bọọlụ na mpaghara Europe n'ihi ike nwa amadị a na-akpa, mana ọtụtụ amaghị na nna ya bụ Roger Lukaku gbakwaara mba Congo bọọlụ oge ha ka na-aza Zaire, malite n'afọ 1993 ruo 1996. 
Roger Lukaku gbara bọọlụ n'otu egwu KV Oostende, KV Mechelen na Germinal Ekeren nke mba Belgium tupu ọ laa ezumike n'afọ 1999. 
Romelu Lukaku na-agbara mba Belgium ugbua ma bụrụ onye kacha nye goolu n'otu bọọlụ mba ahụ, dịka o nyerela goolu 68. 
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Jordan Lukaku na-agbakwa bọọlụ n'otu SD Ponferradina nke mba Spain. 
George Weah/Instagram George Weah na nwa ya Timothy onye na-agbara mba Amerịka bọọlụ Kamgbe egwu bọọlụ malitere, naanị otu onye Afrịka nwetarala nturuugo onye kacha agba bọọlụ n'ụwa niile; onye ahụ bụ nwa amadi Liberia aha ya bụ George Weah, onye bụzi onyeisiala mba Liberia ugbua. 
Mana otu ihe George Weah na-emenwughị bụ ịga asọmpi iko mba ụwa. 
N'afọ 2022, nwa ya bụ Timothy Weah mere ihe ahụ nna ya emenwughị dịka o so mba USA gaa asọmpi iko mba ụwa na Qatar. 
Tupu o sonye otu bọọlụ nke USA, Timothy Weah nwere ohere ịgbara mba anọ bọọlụ: Amerịka - ebe a mụrụ ya, Liberia - obodo nna ya, Jamaica - obodo nne ya, na France obodo ebe ọ nọ kamgbe ọ dị afọ 14. 
Na Qatar 2022, Timothy nyere goolu n'asọmpi USA na Wales, nke bụ goolu mbụ ọ na-enye n'asọmpi Iko Mba ụwa. 
BBC anaghị ahụta maka ọdịnaya nke saịtị ndị dị na mpụga. 
Usoro anyị maka njikọ dị na mpụga..
